openwebui_variables.name: AUDIO_STT_OPENAI_API_BASE_URL
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the OpenAI-compatible base URL to use for Speech-to-Text.

openwebui_variables.name: AUDIO_STT_OPENAI_API_KEY
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the OpenAI API key to use for Speech-to-Text.

openwebui_variables.name: AUDIO_TTS_OPENAI_API_BASE_URL
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the OpenAI-compatible base URL to use for text-to-speech.

openwebui_variables.name: AUDIO_TTS_OPENAI_API_KEY
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the API key to use for text-to-speech.

openwebui_variables.name: ENABLE_OPENAI_API
openwebui_variables.description: Enables the use of OpenAI APIs.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGES_OPENAI_API_BASE_URL
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the OpenAI-compatible base URL to use for DALL-E image generation.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGES_OPENAI_API_KEY
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the API key to use for DALL-E image generation.

openwebui_variables.name: OPENAI_API_BASE_URL
openwebui_variables.description: Configures the OpenAI base API URL.

openwebui_variables.name: OPENAI_API_BASE_URLS
openwebui_variables.description: Supports balanced OpenAI base API URLs, semicolon-separated.

openwebui_variables.name: OPENAI_API_KEYS
openwebui_variables.description: Supports multiple OpenAI API keys, semicolon-separated.

openwebui_variables.name: RAG_AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the API key for Azure OpenAI Services when using Azure OpenAI for RAG embeddings.

openwebui_variables.name: RAG_OPENAI_API_BASE_URL
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the OpenAI base API URL to use for RAG embeddings.

openwebui_variables.name: RAG_OPENAI_API_KEY
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the OpenAI API key to use for RAG embeddings.
